description.narrative: Output 2: By 2019, priority target audiences, especially decision makers, donors and children are sensitive to the situation of children and women in Mali, especially that of marginalized children, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: [Programme Effectiveness] : Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2: By 2019, priority target audiences, especially decision makers, donors and children are sensitive to the situation of children and women in Mali, especially that of marginalized children

description.narrative: UNICEF in Mali continued to leverage campaigns, media relations and digital storytelling to drive action for children in Mali. Significant shifts in policy were achieved as children were enabled to conduct their own advocacy through the presentation of youth manifestoes at high-level forums and televised round tables with decision-makers. A significant range of high-quality multimedia and digital products were produced to support resource mobilization and advocacy objectives, in particular in favor of child protection, inclusive education, immunization and nutrition. | Status:Met | As-of Date:07/02/2020
